scripts.minify: find ./build -type f \( -name '*.js' -o -name '*.css' -o -name '*.html' \) -exec sh -c 'for f; do case "$f" in *.js) terser "$f" -o "$f" --compress --mangle ;; *.css) cleancss -o "$f" "$f" ;; *.html) html-minifier-terser "$f" -o "$f" --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-js --minify-css ;; esac; done' sh {} +
scripts.predeploy: vite build && find ./build -type f \( -name '*.js' -o -name '*.css' -o -name '*.html' \) -exec sh -c 'for f; do case "$f" in *.js) terser "$f" -o "$f" --compress --mangle ;; *.css) cleancss -o "$f" "$f" ;; *.html) html-minifier-terser "$f" -o "$f" --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-js --minify-css ;; esac; done' sh {} +
